content: The MLB offseason is the period of time between the end of the World Series, which usually takes place in late October or early November, and the start of spring training, which usually begins in mid to late February. During the offseason, teams focus on roster changes, such as trades and free agent signings, and also conduct other business operations such as player contract negotiations and scouting for the upcoming season. The MLB offseason is an important time for teams to improve their rosters and prepare for the next season.
